pullrequest.title: Addition of ERP and CFM keys on urdf parser

content.raw: So, I don't think we are planning to add special gazebo extension tags, as I think we'd like people to start using the syntax discussed in pr #225, but there are some bugs in it. Due to the impending migration to GitHub, I'm going to decline this pull request and request that you follow up with #232 after it is migrated to GitHub.
content.html: So, I don't think we are planning to add special gazebo extension tags, as I think we'd like people to start using the syntax discussed in pr #225, but there are some bugs in it. Due to the impending migration to GitHub, I'm going to decline this pull request and request that you follow up with #232 after it is migrated to GitHub.
